body: <#e5e5e5>You place two fingers into your mouth and utter a shrill whistle.
<#e5e5e5>A bulky orgyuk trots in and looks up at you expectantly.
<white>You no longer enjoy the grace of the gods.
<#e5e5e5>You touch the shield tattoo and suddenly a nearly invisible magical shield forms around you.
<white>You have cleared your ability balance queue.

<#cdcd00><#ffffff>An arcane snowstorm veils the area with bone-biting, impenetrable white. <#00cdcd>There are 2 reishis in a stack here. <white>A bulky orgyuk wanders about, its muscles shifting with each step.

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="east"east/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northwest"northwest/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<white>The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently.
<white>The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently.
<white>There is no exit in that direction.
<white>Your movement causes your magical shield to dissipate.
<#cdcd00><#00cdcd>A small panacea pill lies here. A woody reishi mushroom has been discarded upon the ground here. A small opiate pill lies here. A small depressant pill lies here. <white>

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="north"north/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northeast"northeast/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="southwest"southwest/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="west"west/SEND/COLOR./RExits

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="east"east/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northwest"northwest/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="west"west/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<#cdcd00><#00cdcd>There are 3 reishis in a stack here. <#00ffff>Shara is here. She wields a curved steel scythe in her hands.<white>

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="north"north/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="southeast"southeast/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="west"west/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<white>You feel a deep sense of dread as the sadness anxiety settles in.
<white>You put on your happy face and prepare to face the world!
<white>You remove 1 antipsychotic, bringing the total in the cache to 1064.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;parry head;;orgyuk rake Shara;;fleshbane Shara epteth
<white>You will now attempt to parry attacks to your head.
<#e5e5e5>You bark at a bulky orgyuk and it rakes its claws through Shara with its massive paws.
<#e5e5e5>You spit viciously onto your sitara before stabbing it directly into Shara's shoulder.
<#e5e5e5>Shara jerks to the side, the attack partly dulled.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of epteth has rubbed off your weapon.
<#e5e5e5>Shara winces in pain, the wound reddening as it swells.
<white>Shara takes a drink from a delicate duskywing vial.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<white>Shara presses a mending poultice against her left arm, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white>Shara ceases to wield a curved steel scythe, securing it to an iron-studded weaponbelt.
<#e5e5e5>Dripping some blood from her mouth onto her hand, Shara fiercely strikes you in the chest, leaving behind a crimson rune.
<#e5e5e5>Shara's eyes meet yours, suddenly locking your gaze to her. She utters a sharp, unintelligible whisper, and you break free of her piercing gaze.
<#e5e5e5>You feel weaker and a change comes over your body.
<#e5e5e5>You feel a gentle intrusion in your mind.
<white>With the other paw, a bulky orgyuk rakes into Shara with its wicked claws.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;series raze spinslash vertical Shara epteth
<white>When you can act: stand;;series raze spinslash vertical Shara epteth
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<#e5e5e5>You raze Shara's speed defence with an ivory white sitara.
<#e5e5e5>You quickly flow into the Laesan stance.
<#e5e5e5>With a pivot and kick, you spin into the air, drawing blood from Shara's left arm with two separate cuts before touching the ground.
<#e5e5e5>Shara twists and turns her body, dodging the attack.
<#e5e5e5>You quickly flow into the Ein-Fasit stance.
<#e5e5e5>You tear through Shara with a long vertical slice.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of epteth has rubbed off your weapon.
<#e5e5e5>You quickly flow into the Vae-Sant stance.
<white>Shara takes a drink from a delicate duskywing vial.
<white>Shara presses a mending poultice against her left arm, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;series feint head spinslash lateral jab Shara epteth
<white>When you can act: stand;;series feint head spinslash lateral jab Shara epteth
<white>Shara takes a drink from a delicate duskywing vial.
<#e5e5e5>Shara's eyes meet yours, suddenly locking your gaze to her. She utters a sharp, unintelligible whisper, and you break free of her piercing gaze.
<#e5e5e5>You shuffle your feet noisily, suddenly bored.
<#e5e5e5>Your mind feels somewhat slower and more plodding.
<white>In your stupidity, you forgot what you were trying to do. Oops.
<white>In your stupidity, you forgot what you were trying to do. Oops.
<white>With the other paw, a bulky orgyuk rakes into Shara with its wicked claws.
<white>An undead apparition runs a deathly finger gently across your arm.
<white>You aren't such a complete idiot anymore.
<white>You remove 1 euphoriant, bringing the total in the cache to 1538.
<white>You feel your health weaken from an unseen assault.
<white>You touch the tree of life tattoo.
<white>Shara takes a drink from a delicate duskywing vial.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>series feint head spinslash lateral jab Shara epteth
<#e5e5e5>You feint to Shara's head, pulling up short of landing a strike.
<#e5e5e5>Shara shifts her guard to protect herself.
<#e5e5e5>You quickly flow into the Laesan stance.
<#e5e5e5>With a pivot and kick, you spin into the air, drawing blood from Shara's right arm with two separate cuts before touching the ground.
<#e5e5e5>You gasp in agony as shadows suddenly strike at your chest, spreading a bone-chilling cold.
<#e5e5e5>You quickly flow into the Ein-Fasit stance.
<#e5e5e5>You step in quickly with a slash across Shara's torso.
<#e5e5e5>You quickly flow into the Laesan stance.
<#e5e5e5>You use Knifeplay Jab (left arm) on Shara.
<#e5e5e5>You drive forth with the tip of your knife, piercing Shara's left arm.
<#e5e5e5>You quickly flow into the Rizet stance.

<white>RNum 42905 /RName<#cdcd00>Standing before the spiraling pylon of Spinesreach./RName

<#cdcd00><white>A stoic Revenant knight coldly scans the area for threats. <#00cdcd>Shifting in and out of phase with reality, a harlequin portal floats in the air here. <white>There are 3 Syssin Defenders here. There are 2 jherzan Archivists here. There are 2 Northern guards here. <#00cdcd>A twisted metal pylon spirals upward, the three prongs entwined together. <white>One paw sitting on her belt, Fridhild Ironfang stands here with a glimmer in her eye. <#00cdcd>A thin, narrow table of polished obsidian is here, a small, personal altar of gray-enameled gold atop it. 2 simple chairs of twisted black iron have been placed at it. A shiny brass plaque hangs here. A thin street lamp dimly illuminates the surroundings with a quiet thrum. A glorious portrait of a burning airship has been hung here. A framed bulletin board has been fixed here, hosting minor notes about calculations and quota timeframes. <white>There are 3 stoic revenant knights here. There are 2 Spirean Sciomancers here. <#00cdcd>A crude siphoning device has been left here. <#ffff00>A bustling caravan is here, setting aside boxes and large crates around the glimmering pylon.
